Title: How to Use Systems to Achieve Your Goals with Craig Groeschel
Description:
Join us as our host, George Kamel, talks to Craig Groeschel. Craig is a bestselling author. He is also a co-founder and the senior pastor of Life.Church—one of the largest churches in the U.S. with dozens of locations all over the country. Craig talks through creating systems on your team and the role they play in a growing organization. Later in the episode, George chats with Kacy Maxwell—the executive director of marketing for EntreLeadership. He shares some of the roadblocks you’ll probably face when implementing a new system and how you can overcome them.


You’ll learn:

•      If systems are an obstacle to your success

•      The three questions to answer to hit your goals

•      Craig Groeschel’s daily habits for crushing goals

•      The three reasons people fail to accomplish their goals
